sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>GlideAgg</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var ga = new GlideAggregate('incident'); ga.addAggregate('COUNT', 'category'); ga.query(); while(ga.next()){ gs.print('The ' + ga.category + ga.getAggregate('COUNT', 'category')); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-11-07 16:08:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6fca67aa4752f590020ba9f8536d4351</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>GlideAgg</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6fca67aa4752f590020ba9f8536d4351</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-11-07 16:42:07</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
